issue.title: [CI] Have nightly integration test for Spark's latest release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7717](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7717). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we only test spark's master branch, but in order to ensure that we don't introduce regressions with releases specific spark releases must be tested.
